title: Sarcoid Sample 1 test set
growth_protocol_ch1: Blood was taken into Tempus and frozen
extract_protocol_ch1: RNon-active sarcoidosis was extracted using the MagMAX-96 Blood RNon-active sarcoidosis Isolation Kit and globin reduced using GLOBINclear
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated, amplified cRNon-active sarcoidosis were prepared using the IllumiNon-active sarcoidosis CustomPrep RNon-active sarcoidosis amplification kit
data_processing: Background subtracted, normalised and log2 transformed for normalised values and non-normalised values have only had background subtraction
contact_institute: MRC National Institute for Medical Research

label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated, amplified cRNon-active sarcoidosis were prepared using the IllumiNon-active sarcoidosis CustomPrep RNon-active sarcoidosis amplification kit
data_processing: Background subtracted, normalised and log2 transformed for normalised values and non-normalised values have only had background subtraction
contact_institute: MRC National Institute for Medical Research
